page.title: 14Farnham Hospital
page.content: Farnham Hospital is situated on the site of an old warehouse.The grounds cover 12 acres.Since it was built in 1850 two new buildings have been added.The National Health Service run the hospital and they give 4 million pounds a year.There are 8 diffrent wards. Boundstone East,Boundstone West and Tanner are Geriatric wards. Crooksbury,Waverly and Mary are Short stay surgery.Trimmers is a G.P.Male. Bourne is a G.P.Female.Between them they can hold 204 patients.There used to be a ward called Crondall,which could hold 16 people,but it closed in 1977 due to lack of funds.Fifty operations a week are performed.The staff include doctors,nurses, physiotherapists,radiographers, pharmosists,domestics and porters.
